knimeNode.name: Time Aggregator
knimeNode.shortDescription: Aggregates the time to a higher aggregation level (e.g. month to quarter).

fullDescription.intro: Takes the time values from a column, aggregates it to a higher granularity level (e.g. from month to quarter, etc.) and appends the result as a string column.
fullDescription.option: Select the column containing the time that should be aggregated
Choose aggregation level (year, quarter, month, week, day)
The name of the new column

ports.dataIn: In data with at least one date column
ports.dataOut: In data with the aggregated time column appended
